title: Exploring AptosLaunch Token Platform
description: Discover AptosLaunch, a decentralized launchpad on Aptos that helps new projects conduct fair token offerings, raise capital, and build communities through various launch models and participation tiers.

tasks.title: Prepare for Token Launches
tasks.description: Add at least 0.05 APT to your wallet to begin exploring AptosLaunch

tasks.title: Launchpad Basics
tasks.description: Understand what a token launchpad does
tasks.question: What is AptosLaunch's primary function?
options: A platform for launching new tokens and conducting token sales
tasks.correctAnswer: A platform for launching new tokens and conducting token sales

tasks.title: Token Launch Models
tasks.description: Learn about different ways to launch tokens
tasks.question: Which token launch models might AptosLaunch offer?
options: Fair launches, IDOs (Initial DEX Offerings), public sales, and private rounds
tasks.correctAnswer: Fair launches, IDOs (Initial DEX Offerings), public sales, and private rounds

tasks.title: Participation Requirements
tasks.description: Understanding how to participate in launches
tasks.question: How might participation in AptosLaunch offerings be structured?
options: Anyone can participate equally in all launches
Through tiered participation based on staked tokens or NFT holdings
tasks.correctAnswer: Through tiered participation based on staked tokens or NFT holdings

tasks.title: Project Vetting
tasks.question: How are projects typically selected for launching on AptosLaunch?
options: No vetting process, anyone can launch
Through thorough due diligence and project review by the platform team
Only projects from the Aptos Foundation
tasks.correctAnswer: Through thorough due diligence and project review by the platform team

tasks.title: Token Distribution
tasks.question: How are tokens typically distributed after a successful launch on AptosLaunch?
options: According to the project's tokenomics, which often includes vesting schedules
tasks.correctAnswer: According to the project's tokenomics, which often includes vesting schedules

tasks.title: Fundraising Mechanisms
tasks.question: What fundraising mechanisms might AptosLaunch support?
options: Fixed price pools, dutch auctions, fair launches, and batch auctions
tasks.correctAnswer: Fixed price pools, dutch auctions, fair launches, and batch auctions

tasks.title: Post-Launch Support
tasks.question: What post-launch support might AptosLaunch offer to projects?
options: Liquidity provision, marketing assistance, exchange listings, and development support
tasks.correctAnswer: Liquidity provision, marketing assistance, exchange listings, and development support

tasks.title: Platform Governance
tasks.question: How might governance decisions be made on AptosLaunch?
options: Through a DAO where token holders can vote on proposals
tasks.correctAnswer: Through a DAO where token holders can vote on proposals

tasks.title: Risk Management
tasks.question: How might AptosLaunch help manage risks for participants?
options: Through KYC requirements, project vetting, and sometimes token vesting
tasks.correctAnswer: Through KYC requirements, project vetting, and sometimes token vesting
